explains: n. 说服，劝服；说服力；（宗教或政治）信仰；教派；某种人（或物）
wordGroup: burden of persuasion 说服责任；举证责任

sentences.en: He had to use all his powers of persuasion.
sentences.cn: 他只好使出说服人的全部本领。

sentences.en: After a little gentle persuasion, he agreed to come.
sentences.cn: 耐心劝说一下，他就同意来了。

sentences.en: She agreed to come, after a little gentle persuasion.
sentences.cn: 经过一阵细心劝说，她表示愿意来。
